tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_records (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  skill_set VARCHAR(100),
  certifications TEXT[],
  training_records JSON
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeCertifications (
  certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  certification_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeTrainingRecords (
  training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  training_course VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  training_date DATE,
  trainer_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeWorkHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  company_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeWorkSchedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  working_days VARCHAR(20)
);
